page.title: 03Soham Pumpkin Fair
page.content: The{Soham Pumpkin Fair}is held annually.People bring pumpkins from all over East Anglia to see which is the heaviest, and the heaviest wins prize money. People bring sunflowers as well to see who's is the tallest.They also win a prize. There are stalls, like Tombola and Hoopla, and the money rasied is given to local charities. Each year the fair comes to Soham on the recreation ground. A lot of people go there for the different amusements, like rockets which go upsidedown, bumper cars, ghost train, waltzers and others. People who go there enjoy themselves very much, and the rides are quite cheap.
